about:title: About
about:feature_calculator: Quick insulin calculations based on your carbs and blood sugar
about:feature_products: Save your favorite foods with carb values - no need to remember them
about:feature_settings: Customize everything to match your personal insulin ratios
about:feature_offline: Works without internet - all your data stays on your phone
about:disclaimer_text: This app is made by a diabetic for diabetics to make calculations easier. It's not a replacement for professional medical advice - always talk to your doctor before changing anything!
